required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety With Ziprasidone in First-episode Psychosis
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety With Ziprasidone in the Treatment of First-episode Schizophrenia Spectrum Disorder: Multi-center Study

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of the study is to investigate the efficacy and safety of ziprasidone in patients with first episode psychosis.

primary_outcome.measure: Symptoms assessment by objective rating scales
primary_outcome.description: PANSS total score, SANS, clinical global impression scale, GAF

primary_outcome.measure: Symptoms assessment by objective rating scales
primary_outcome.description: PANSS total score, SANS, clinical global impression scale, GAF

primary_outcome.description: PANSS total score, SANS, clinical global impression scale, GAF

primary_outcome.measure: Symptoms assessment by objective rating scales
primary_outcome.description: PANSS total score, SANS, clinical global impression scale, GAF, DAS-S

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of adverse events by objective rating scales and self report scales
secondary_outcome.description: Simpson and Angus rating scale, Barnes Akathisia rating scale and Abnormal Involuntary Movement Scale

secondary_outcome.measure: Assessment of adverse events by objective rating scales and self report scales
secondary_outcome.description: Simpson and Angus rating scale, Barnes Akathisia rating scale and Abnormal Involuntary Movement Scale

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients who meet DSM-IV criteria for first episode schizophrenia, schizophreniform disorder and schizoaffective disorder
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patients with previously prescribed antipsychotic medication in 2 weeks or more
- patients with substance-induced psychotic disorder, serious suicide attempt, neurological disorder, etc.

facility.name: Department of Psychiatry, Chonbuk national University Hospital

responsible_party.organization: Chonbuk National University Hospital, Jeonju, Korea
